name: What's So Cool About going on an Adventure? My Life After a Dangerous Quest!
name_original: What's So Cool About going on an Adventure? My Life After a Dangerous Quest!
description:
It's over, it's done. What songs will they sing about you now that the battle is won? 

Well, tell them yourself.

Here's the thing, the heat of battle doesn't give enough time for you to have a complete record of what's happening- some details might be missing. Or embellished. Or just wasn't as cool as you thought it was.

Cover Image by Marco Santiago from Pixabay

a submission to "What's So Cool About Jam" and based off Jared Sinclair's "What's So Cool About Outer Space?"
